sample.title: Watermark Creator -- visible watermark
sample.description: This template shows the usage of the Watermark Creator component embedding a text as a visible watermark into an image.
sample.title: Wasserzeichen-Erzeuger -- Sichtbares Wasserzeichen
sample.description: Diese Vorlage zeigt, wie man m.H. des Wasserzeichen-Erzeugers ein sichtbares Wasserzeichen in ein Bild einfügen kann.

replacement.value: This template shows how to embed a visible text as a watermark into an image. In the "File input" component you can choose the image to be used. In the "Text input" component you can write a text that is added to the image as an watermark. This text can be changed while the component is being executed.

In the component's settings you can select (From top to bottom):\line - The position of the watermark\line - The maximum text size to be used for the watermark text\line - The font to be used for the watermark\line - The location of the watermark on the image
